idea: PROTTON SYNERGY is a product design and innovation consultancy with over 30 years of experience partnering with medical and consumer companies to build their business through design. our team's long history in designing consumer products to bring an added focus on people and emotion to the healthcare market. The results are medical devices and digital health solutions that emotionally engage their users. We inspire users to buy in at a deep emotional level, which motivates behavior change, increases adherence, enables better health outcomes, and ultimately improves lives.
name: PROTTON SYNERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To act as manufactures, traders, dealers, suppliers, distributors, fabricators, importers and exporters of instruments/ equipments/ apparatus such as laboratory consumables and chemicals, quality checking & controlling instruments, measuring & analytical instruments, opticals and other related instruments/equipments/ apparatus required by laboratories, educational institutions, nursing homes, hospitals, health-care centres, agriculture, energy, research and development centres of trade and industry and provide repairs and maintenance services on annual contract basis or otherwise and to set up laboratory for testing of materials made from cotton, glass, ceramics, woollen, metals of all description including ferrous and non-ferrous metal and raw material of every description.

idea:
From the very start of our journey in November 2019, CONNECTING CYBER NETWORKS has always been committed in providing the very best quality of training to our students based on the current job market availability and requirements. We believe very strongly in the need for a practical education that puts the knowledge and skills that we gain in the classroom to the test. Our entire syllabus is designed in a 80/20 format (80% practical/20% theory) to keep the learning practical and real-world.

WE HAVE A WRITTEN AND SIGNED 100% JOB GUARANTEE OR REFUND POLICY ON ALL OUR CAREER LAUNCH PROGRAMS offered to all our students because at CCN, our focus is always on giving quality training to our students and making sure that their careers always come first!
name: Connecting Cyber Networks Pvt Ltd.

idea: We are planning to build solution for pregnancy care so that mother and child both are in best health. We cover all problem statements right from family planning to right health of new born baby. It will help parents to find all services and products under one roof with highest in quality because we will stringent QC process to bring anything on our platform. E.g. we will bring certified/trained Japa maids, all doctors revolving around child and moms health, physiotherapist for post pregnancy care, certified dietitians, babysitters etc.
